examples.example: 今天在街上偶遇了一位老朋友，我们开心地聊了很久。

translate.english: Today I ran into an old friend on the street, and we had a happy chat for a long time.

examples.example: 每次见到老朋友，我都感到格外亲切和温暖。

translate.english: Every time I see an old friend, I feel extremely kind and warm.

examples.example: 我的老朋友总是在我遇到困难时第一时间伸出援手。

translate.english: My old friend always offers a helping hand at the first time when I encounter difficulties.
